_header: When I think on the Rood
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, passion of
_description: A meditation on the Passion — three 6-line stanzas

BodAsh360VII.First Lines:
Qvanne I zenke onne þe rodequorupe one þu stode
                    squete ihesu mi leman…
BodAsh360VII.Last Lines:
…No selli þoch I wepe an mi sinnes betteif I liuien wel
                    canB. O bone ihesu
BodAsh360VII.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 63-6.
Stevick,  Robert D.,
                        ed.  
             One Hundred Middle English Lyrics.
         Indianapolis: Bobbs-Merrill, 1964: 24.
